statements: DELETE FROM MedicationTracking WHERE patient_id = 123 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM MedicationTracking WHERE compliance = FALSE AND dosage > 100;
DELETE FROM MedicationTracking WHERE patient_id = 123 AND compliance = FALSE;
DELETE FROM MedicationTracking WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND dosage > 100;
DELETE FROM medication_logs WHERE compliance = TRUE;
DELETE FROM medication_logs WHERE compliance = false AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Medication_Log WHERE patient_id = 10 AND date_time < '2022-06-30';
